version.body:
ActiveResource calls super - https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/activeresource/lib/active_resource/validations.rb#L123
ActiveModel does the clear - https://github.com/rails/rails/blob/master/activemodel/lib/active_model/validations.rb#L166
So I guess my issue isn't with how or where that's happening, rather - why does it work that way, and is there a way to do what I wanted to do?
